# Class Structure
The `dbSpatial` package is designed to work with spatial geometries in a DuckDB table. The package builds on the [DuckDB spatial extension](https://duckdb.org/docs/extensions/spatial.html).

`dbSpatial` objects adopt the S4 class system and represent spatial `geometries` in a DuckDB table. The `{dbSpatial}` package provides methods for constructing `dbSpatial` objects from various data sources, as well as various spatial operations for working with these data.

Of particular importance to `dbSpatial` is being able to work with diverse data sources. The package provides methods for reading/writing `dbSpatial` objects from/to data.frames, S3 and S4 spatial-related objects (e.g. objects from `{sf}` or `{terra})`, and [several other spatial files](https://duckdb.org/docs/extensions/spatial.html#st_read--read-spatial-data-from-files) that are supported by the DuckDB spatial extension.
